      • enumFormat

        public static java.lang.String enumFormat(java.lang.String text)
        Converts text into the format usually used by Enums. Great for getting a Material from a user's input.

        The conversion process does the following:
        • Removes whitespace on the edges of the text
        • Converts the text to upper case
        • Replaces all spaces with underscores
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        Returns:
        The formatted text

      • safeString

        public static java.lang.String safeString(java.lang.String text)
        Method extracted from Essentials to remove special characters
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:
        The safe text
